item.title: Managing configuration with multiple git identities
item.description: Git is a versioning control system tools for source code that we can find anywhere nowadays. I use it for almost everything: managing my dotfiles, in all my personal projects and, of course, at work. But using git at work, where it is very common to have multiple identities, could be quite tedious. Problem Link to heading I use GitLab to manage all my personal projects, with a automatic mirror to my GitHub account.
